title: ⚙️ Set User Credentials
content:
git config user.name "judigot"
git config user.email "judigot@gmail.com"
git config --global user.name "judigot"
git config --global user.email "judigot@gmail.com"

title: ⚠️ Upload New Project or Replace Remote Repository Files
content:
git init
git add .
git commit -m "Commit"
git remote add origin git@github.com:judigot/<repositoryName>.git
git push origin main
git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/main main
git status

title: 💾 Upload & Save Changes
content:
git add .
git commit -m "Commit"
git push origin
git status
